E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1991
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Jerry Mumphrey



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Ron Karkovice
Dear Sir,
Ron Karkovice is hitting the ball well at A Cedar Rapids Reds!
He has an AVG of .400, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Bob Wells
Dear Sir,
Bob Wells is doing pretty good at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
He has an ERA of 2.60, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Thursday, 5/22/1991
Subject: Progress of Don August
Dear Sir,

a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Wednesday, 6/4/1991
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,

How about you?

Regards,
Junior Ortiz
